#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int j=1;j<=t;j++)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int* arr=new int[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>arr[i];
		}
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		int ans=arr[n-1]+arr[n-2]+arr[n-3];
		cout<<"Case "<<j<<": "<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
